name: FVCK-NVIDA
description: Probably the most iconic moment of Linus Torvalds, the Linux creator, now as an NFT. A user complaining about the lack of quality NVIDIA drivers on Linux, now I don't remember the distribution, Linus says that NVIDIA was the worst company he had dealt with and that they couldn't be developed properly. At the end of his speech, he looks at the cameras and raising his middle finger says "FUCK NVIDIA".
